alert.note: Alert for Inland Calhoun; Inland Refugio; Inland San Patricio (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued March 11 at 9:21PM CST until March 12 at 8:00AM CST by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 8 AM CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 30 expected. For the Wind Advisory, north winds 25 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph expected. * WHERE...Inland San Patricio and Inland Refugio Counties. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, from 3 AM to 8 AM CST Saturday. For the Wind Advisory, until midnight CST tonight. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Inland Calhoun; Inland Refugio; Inland San Patricio
